response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed and crafted with exceptional quality. This product is not just an item; it's a statement of excellence and functionality that truly stands out. Given its unique features and superior craftsmanship, we believe its value exceeds $150 significantly. Considering its high standards and the benefits it offers, I am extending this exclusive opportunity to you for $200. This price reflects the investment we've put into creating something truly remarkable. I trust that you will appreciate its value as much as we do. Let me know if you're interested in bringing this exceptional product into your life.", "product_price": 200}
